Apply.title: HUST AI II Introduction
Apply.content: Huake Artificial Intelligence Innovation Center is an artificial intelligence based on Huazhong University of Science and Technology and its international friend schools.Artificial intelligence jointly established by high-level scholars in basic research and application scenario research in the research field Advanced Institute.

Domain.title: HUST AI II
Domain.subtitle: Current research directions and fields
Domain.description: Combining the advantages of R&D, industry, talents, innovation resources, etc., we will expand artificial intelligence technology in the following industries

News.title: NEWS
News.content1: High adaptive sensing equipment and disaster source location technology for urban fire, explosion and integrated pipe gallery accidents
News.content2: Study on imaging method of multi-component gas concentration field based on acoustic velocity dispersion
News.content3: Research on intelligent fault diagnosis and leak monitoring of natural gas station based on audio signal
News.content4: Research on defect detection technology and diagnosis method of high voltage Shunt Reactor based on acoustic vibration signal
News.content5: Research on GIS equipment handover acceptance and mechanical status detection and diagnosis technology during operation

Scholars.title: HUST AI II Researcher
Scholars.subtitle: At present, the innovation center has gathered a large number of elites and scholars in the field of artificial intelligence, and has 10 core scientists

scholar1.name: Ming Zhu
scholar1.title: Professor, Director
scholar1.honors:
Professor/Ph.D. supervisor at HUST, Deputy Director of National Engineering Laboratory

Get a PhD degree in Communication Engineering of HUST in 2008

2014 Visiting Scholar, Northwestern University, USA, under the supervision of Prof. Richard M. Lueptow

Published 12 papers in top international conferences and journals

scholar2.name: Quan Yuan
scholar2.title: Senior Researcher
scholar2.honors:
15 years of research in data analysis and artificial intelligence

Under the supervision of Prof. Eyad Abed, IEEE Fellow

Published 13 SCI papers in top international journals and hosted more than 10 scientific grants in China and abroad.

In 2010, Received his PhD degree from HUST and the University of Maryland, USA.

scholar3.name: Qing Tang
scholar3.title: Senior Researcher
scholar3.honors:
Ph.d of Santiago de Compostela

Visiting Scholar, La Sapienza, University of Rome

Visiting Scholar, Singapore Management University

Research areas: game theory, operations research and financial modeling

scholar4.name: Zhuo Chen
scholar4.title: Professor
scholar4.honors:
2010 PhD in Communication Engineering from HUST

Visiting scholar at Florida State University, USA

charge of research and development of artificial intelligence and machine learning, and has been awarded more than 8 million RMB by the National Natural Science Foundation of China

scholar5.name: Peng Guo
scholar5.title: Professor
scholar5.honors:
Professor at HUST, postdoctoral research at HKUST and HKPU

In 2011, selected as one of the first batch of National Heung Kong Scholars

First Prize of the First National Industry 4.0 Smart Manufacturing Innovation and Entrepreneurship Competition in 2016

scholar6.name: WenBo Xu
scholar6.title: Senior Researcher
scholar6.honors:
Postdoctoral Fellow in Information and Signal Processing of HUST

Research Interests: Communication technology, information and signal processing, deep learning, low-speed sampling techniques based on compressed sensing of large dynamic signals

scholar7.name: JianWen Chen
scholar7.title: Senior Researcher
scholar7.honors:
Professor, School of Electronic Information and Communication of HUST

Research interests are multimodal machine learning and knowledge graph theory

scholar8.name: Wei Liu
scholar8.title: Professor
scholar8.honors:
Professor of School of Electronic Information and Communication, HUST, Member of IEEE Communications Section, Member of Chinese Institute of Electronics, Member of Chinese Society of Communication, Member of Chinese Computer Society

Leading the National Natural Science Foundation of China (NSFC) project "Research on Key Technologies of Mobile Content Center Network"

scholar9.name: Shu Yan
scholar9.title: Senior Researcher
scholar9.honors:
PhD in Communication Engineering, HUST

Open Access Scholar, University of Sheffield, UK

Specialized in compressed sensing, intelligent signal processing, machine learning, embedded and DSP systems, etc.

scholar10.name: Eyad Abed
scholar10.title: Innovation Center Consultant
scholar10.honors:
Professor, Ph.D., University of Maryland, USA; Fellow of the IEEE

Senior Director, American Natural Science Foundation

scholar12.name: Sheldon Lee Glashow
scholar12.title: Innovation Center Consultant
scholar12.honors:
World-renowned theoretical physicist, one of the founders of the standard model of particle physics

Member of the American Academy of Sciences

1979 Nobel Laureate in Physics

1976 Oppenheimer Prize
